casebody.data:
KNOCH, Appellant, v. VON BERNUTH, Respondent. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. April 2, 1894.) Action by Minna Knoch against Marie E. H. Von Bernuth, as executrix etc

Argued before SEDGWICK, C. J., and DUGRO and GILDERSLEEVE, JJ.

*1147Edward Grosse (John W. Goff and Chas. Goldzier, of counsel), for appellant. James MacGregor Smith (Austin Abbott, of counsel), for respondent. PER CURIAM.

The "judgment is affirmed, with costs, on the opinion of the learned court below.
